subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: No. 7 Houston’s vaunted offense was kept at a near-standstill by No. 24 Southern Mississippi, who delivered a drubbing in front of a national television audience.
snippet: No. 7 Houston’s vaunted offense was kept at a near-standstill by No. 24 Southern Mississippi, who delivered a drubbing in front of a national television audience.
